name: Should return 403 when one of field is missing
fullName: ru.stellarburgers.UserRegistrationParameterizedTest.createUserOneOfFieldsMissingShouldReturn403[Attempt to register user with email "", password "interstellar", name "Pulsar" should return response code 403]
description:
Verify that a user cannot be registered if one of the fields is missing.
Expected result: HTTP 403 response, response field "success" - false and an error message "Email, password and name are required fields" in response body.
descriptionHtml:
Verify that a user cannot be registered if one of the fields is missing.
Expected result: HTTP 403 response, response field "success" - false and an error message "Email, password and name are required fields" in response body.

testStage.description:
Verify that a user cannot be registered if one of the fields is missing.
Expected result: HTTP 403 response, response field "success" - false and an error message "Email, password and name are required fields" in response body.

steps.name: Assert that user is not registered

parameters.name: responseBody
parameters.value: Email, password and name are required fields

labels.name: testMethod
labels.value: createUserOneOfFieldsMissingShouldReturn403[Attempt to register user with email "", password "interstellar", name "Pulsar" should return response code 403]
